name: DHR QC Inspection Route Sheet - Rev.01
description: QC Inspection Route Sheet, WI-10784, WI-10177, WI-10211; Document No: RK10040, ECO-22474
sql_for_additional_access: select user_id from [BsWebService].[dbo].[activeEmployees] where (company='BIT Singapore' and ([function]='Quality' or [function]='Operations' or [function]='Manufacturing')) or user_id in (SELECT [user_id]   FROM [BsWebService].[dbo].[bpm_admin])

data_configuration.name: Associate Material Issuance Template
data_configuration.sql_statement: select 'DHR Production Material Issuance - Rev.01' as value

data_configuration.name: Associate Production Confirmation Template Family
data_configuration.sql_statement: select 'DHR Production Confirmation' as value

data_configuration.name: Check Chosen Template
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [DHR_check_chosen_template] '@@template_name','$$selected_order_no'

data_configuration.name: Production Order List
Find Last Route Sheet ID or Order No
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [dbo].[DHR_prod_route_sheet_find_last_route_sheet_id_or_order_no] '$$mode','$$order_no',NULL,'$$existing_proc_id','@@template_id'

data_configuration.name: Material_Issuance_header_detail
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select top 1 * from (
    select p.id as process_id,d.process_matrix_id, d.label, d.value 
    from bpm_process_detail d  WITH (NOLOCK)
    inner join bpm_process_matrix m WITH (NOLOCK) on d.process_matrix_id=m.id and m.type='initiator'
    inner join bpm_process p WITH (NOLOCK) on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn
    inner join bpm_process_template t WITH (NOLOCK) on t.id=p.process_template_id 
        and t.name='$$mtl_iss_tmpl'
        --and t.name='DHR Production Material Issuance - Rev.01'
    and  d.process_matrix_id in(
            select process_matrix_id 
            from bpm_process_detail  WITH (NOLOCK)
            where [label]='Order No' 
            and [value]='$$orderNo'
            -- and [value]='210000162552'
        ) and d.process_matrix_id in(
            select process_matrix_id 
            from bpm_process_detail WITH (NOLOCK)  
            where [label]='status' and [value]='in progress' 
        ) 
    ) detailResult  
PIVOT ( 
    MAX(value) 
    for label in (
        [Order No],
        [Material], 
        [Material Description], 
        [Store Location], 
        [Plan Qty], 
        [Batch No], 
        [Start Date], 
        [Revision], 
        [Drawing Number], 
        [Alt BOM], 
        [Drawing Rev#], 
        [End Date], 
[Remarks],
        [Please Choose Production Line], 
        [Please Choose Production Line Sub-group]
    ) 
) as material_issuing_table

data_configuration.name: Material_Issuance_item_list_detail
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select * from (
			select d.process_matrix_id, tc.row_index,tc.label, tc.value from [dbo].[bpm_process_table_cell] tc
			inner join bpm_process_detail d on 
				tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id and 
				d.process_matrix_id in (
					select process_matrix_id 
					from bpm_process_detail dd 
						inner join bpm_process_matrix mm on dd.process_matrix_id=mm.id
						inner join bpm_process p on mm.process_id=p.id and mm.process_revn=p.revn
						inner join bpm_process_template t on t.id=p.process_template_id and t.name = '$$mtl_iss_tmpl' 
					where dd.label='Order No' and  dd.value in (select top 1 * from string_split ('$$orderNo','-')) and 
				d.process_matrix_id in (
					select process_matrix_id 
					from bpm_process_detail dd
					inner join bpm_process_matrix mm on dd.process_matrix_id=mm.id
					inner join bpm_process p on mm.process_id=p.id and mm.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close'
					inner join bpm_process_template t on t.id=p.process_template_id and t.name = '$$mtl_iss_tmpl') )and 			
				d.label='item list'
				
		) tableResult 
		PIVOT (
		        MAX(value) 
			for label in (
				[Item Cat],
				[Item Code],
				[Item Code Desc],
				[Quantity],
				[Unit],
				[SS],
				[Qty Actual],
				[Batch/Serial No],
				[SLED],
				[Sloc],
				[Alt Gp],
				[AltG Pr]
			)
		)
		as material_issuing_item_list

data_configuration.name: Set Route Sheet Sequence
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [dbo].[DHR_prod_route_sheet_set_sequence] '$$mode','$$order_no','$$existing_proc_id','@@template_id'

data_configuration.name: Find QTY Finished by Prod and Remark from Prod Confirm
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select TOP (1)
[id],
[revn],
[last_update],
ISNULL([QTY Prod Finished],0) as [QTY Prod Finished],
ISNULL([Remark],'N/A') as [Remark],
ISNULL([Labour Hour],'N/A') as [Labour Hour]
from (
select  p.id,p.revn,p.last_update,d.[label],d.[value]
from [dbo].[bpm_process_detail] d
inner join [dbo].[bpm_process_matrix] m on m.id=d.process_matrix_id 
and d.process_matrix_id in (
	select process_matrix_id from [dbo].[bpm_process_detail] where [label]='Order No' 
	and [value]='$$order_no'
	--and [value]='210000196680'
)
inner join bpm_process p on p.id=m.process_id and p.revn=m.process_revn and p.status='close'
inner join [dbo].[bpm_process_template] t on t.id=p.process_template_id 
and t.name like '$$prod_cfm_tmpl_family'+'%'
--and t.name like 'DHR Production Confirmation%'
) tableResult
PIVOT (
	MAX(value) 
	for [label] in (
		[QTY Prod Finished],
		[Remark],
		[Labour Hour]
	)
)
as pivotTable
order by [last_update] DESC

data_configuration.name: Material Issuing Attachment List
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [dbo].[DHR_attachment_by_matrix] '$$pid','initiator','Attachment List','yes'

data_configuration.sql_statement: $$sumOfTest

data_configuration.sql_statement: $$sumOfTest

data_configuration.name: QC Inspector List
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select  user_id,last_name+' '+first_name+' ('+user_id+')' as user_disp
  FROM [BsWebService].[dbo].[activeEmployees]
  where company='BIT Singapore' and [function]='Quality' and
  ((job_title like 'Inspector%' and job_title not like '%LRQC%') or
  job_title ='Assistant Leader' or 
  job_title = 'Team Lead, IQC and IPQC')
and user_id !='$$initiator_id'

data_configuration.name: Retrieve data by Existing PID
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select  [Shift],
		[Station],
               [Please Select Mode] as [Selected Mode],
		CASE
			WHEN [Please Select Mode] = 'Amend existing' THEN [Original Initiator] --when mode is Amend Existing, use original initiator of the existing process
			ELSE [Initiator]
		END as [Original Initiator],
		CASE
			WHEN [Please Select Mode] = 'Amend existing' THEN [Original Completion Date] --when mode is Amend Existing, use original Completion Date of the existing process
			ELSE close_on 
		END as [Original Completion Date],
		[Work together with],
		[What has been changed],
		CASE
			WHEN [Selected Line Verification Approver] IS NULL THEN e.first_name+' '+e.last_name
			ELSE [Selected Line Verification Approver]
		END as [Selected Line Verification Approver],
		CASE
			WHEN [Line Verification On] IS NOT NULL THEN [Line Verification On] 
			ELSE (select top 1 mtx.action_on
					from bpm_process_matrix mtx inner join bpm_process prc
					on mtx.[type]='approver' 
					and mtx.process_id=prc.id 
					and prc.id='$$existing_process_id'
					--and prc.id='qc-rs-01-20230818155818' 
					and prc.status='close' ) 
		END as [Line Verification On]

from (
			select p.close_on, d.label,d.value
			
			from bpm_process_detail d 
				inner join bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn 
				and p.status='close' 
				and m.type='initiator'
				and p.id='$$existing_process_id'
				--and p.id='qc-rs-01-20230818155818'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Shift],
				[Please Select Mode],
				[Station],
				[Initiator],
				[Original Initiator],
				[Original Completion Date],
				[Work together with],
				[What has been changed],
				[Line Verification Approver],
				[Selected Line Verification Approver],
				[Line Verification On]
			) 
		) as pivotTable 
		left join [BsWebService].[dbo].[func_get_all_employees](DEFAULT) e 
		on e.user_id=pivotTable.[Line Verification Approver]
		order by [Shift]

data_configuration.name: Retrieve completed qty
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [dbo].[DHR_qc_route_sheet_history_completed_qty_by_shift]  '$$mode','$$order_no','$$existing_proc_id','@@template_id'

data_configuration.name: Retrieve Test Items table from existing process
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select  
        *
	   from (
	   select tc.label,tc.value,tc.row_index+1 as [line]
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_table_cell tc 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id
					and d.label='Test Items'
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m 
					on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
					and m.type='initiator'
					
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id 
					and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close' 
					--and p.id='qc-rs-01-20220913142308'
					and p.id='$$existing_pid'

			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Date of Test],
[Test Item],
				[QTY], 
				[Destructive],
				[Destructive Qty],
				[Pass/Fail],
				[Remark]
			) 
		) as route_sheet_table 
		order by [line]

data_configuration.name: Initiator Attachment List
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [dbo].[DHR_attachment_by_matrix] '$$target_process_id','initiator','Route Sheet Attachment List','true'

data_configuration.name: Equipment Data
Retrieve QC Equipment Information by Existing ID
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select * from (
            select tc.row_index,tc.label, tc.value 
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].[bpm_process_table_cell] tc	inner join 	
             [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d 
			 on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id and d.label='Equipment Information'
                inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id and m.type='initiator'
                inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn 
                and p.id= '$$target_process_id' and p.status='close'
            ) detailResult  
        PIVOT ( 
            MAX(value)  
            for label in (
                [Equipment Name],
                [Equipment ID],
                [Calibration Due Date], 
				[Maintenance Due Date],
                [Remarks]
            ) 
        )  pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Auto Populated Subject
Test Item Name
data_configuration.sql_statement:
SELECT 
	case when [WI Name] IS NOT NULL OR [WI Name]='' THEN [Test Item]+' ('+[WI Name]+')' 
	ELSE [Test Item]
	END AS test_item
  FROM [BpmTemplate].[dbo].[DHR_qc_test_item_with_wi_name]
  WHERE ([Production Line]='$$prod_line' and [Sub-Group]='$$sub_group') or [Production Line]='All'

formula_list.formula: C5=(function(){function getDateYYYYMMDD(d){return [   d.getFullYear(),   ('0' + (d.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2),   ('0' + d.getDate()).slice(-2) ].join('')} return parseInt(getDateYYYYMMDD(new Date(C3)))-parseInt(getDateYYYYMMDD(new Date())) })()

C6=(function(){function getDateYYYYMMDD(d){return [   d.getFullYear(),   ('0' + (d.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2),   ('0' + d.getDate()).slice(-2) ].join('')} return parseInt(getDateYYYYMMDD(new Date(C4)))-parseInt(getDateYYYYMMDD(new Date())) })()
